modShortDescription: Adjustments to 0-CreaturePackZombies, Human Factions & Prefabs, Adjustments to 1-NPCPackHumans (DMT) and more.
modDescription:
## Adjustments to 0-CreaturePackZombies

Makes a number of adjustments to the [0-CreaturePackZombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/creature-packs-a-community-entity-project/) mod, provided by Xyth and company. Many thanks to Xyth and all the people who provided custom NPCs.

### Changelog

Added flame particle effect to CP entities.

[README.md](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-a19-modlets/-/blob/master/0-CreaturePackZombies_khzmusik_Adjustments/README.md) – **[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-a19-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-a19-modlets-master.zip?path=0-CreaturePackZombies_khzmusik_Adjustments)**

## Adjustments to 1-NPCPackHumans (DMT)

Makes a number of adjustments to the [1-NPCPackHumans](https://7daystodiemods.com/npcs-mod/) mod, provided by Xyth and company. That mod is itself dependent upon other mods – see the README.md. Many thanks to Xyth, SphereII, and all the people who provided custom NPCs.

### Changelog

* Adjusted hire costs, by weapon and armor types
* Reduced spawn rates for human NPCs
* Removed trader voice set from NPCs, so they don’t randomly talk to you in Joel’s voice

[README.md](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-a19-modlets/-/blob/master/2-NPCPackHumans_khzmusik_Adjustments_DMT/README.md) – **[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-a19-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-a19-modlets-master.zip?path=2-NPCPackHumans_khzmusik_Adjustments_DMT)**

## Human Factions and Prefabs

New factions, and tools for adding NPCs to prefabs per faction. Also includes “sample” POIs, Tier 2 to Tier 5 for each faction.

### Changelog

* **_(new)_** Added NitroGen prefablist for human prefabs.
* Version bump to Prefabs
* Fixed issues with quests and rally markers  
   * Whiteriver T5 “murder” quest now has correct objective  
   * Added rally marker to T5 Bandits POI  
   * Added rally marker to T5 Military POI
* New version available! Fixes a bug where the Tier 4 Whiteriver POI would not accept quests.

[README.md](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-a19-modlets/-/blob/master/khzmusik_Human_Factions_Prefabs/README.md) – **[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-a19-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-a19-modlets-master.zip?path=khzmusik_Human_Factions_Prefabs)**

## CreaturePack Humans for Human Factions and Prefabs

Adds the [CreaturePack Humans](https://7daystodiemods.com/creature-packs-a-community-entity-project/) to prefabs (POIs) with human faction sleeper volumes.

It is mainly for users who do not want to use DMT mods.

[README.md](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-a19-modlets/-/blob/master/khzmusik_Human_Factions_Prefabs_CreaturePackHumans/README.md) – **[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-a19-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-a19-modlets-master.zip?path=khzmusik_Human_Factions_Prefabs_CreaturePackHumans)**

## NPCPack Humans for Human Factions and Prefabs (DMT)

Adds the [NPCPack Humans](https://7daystodiemods.com/npcs-mod/) to prefabs (POIs) with human faction sleeper volumes.

This is the recommended package to use, provided you don’t mind DMT.

[README.md](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-a19-modlets/-/blob/master/khzmusik_Human_Factions_Prefabs_NPCPackHumans/README.md) – **[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-a19-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-a19-modlets-master.zip?path=khzmusik_Human_Factions_Prefabs_NPCPackHumans)**

## Quests for Human Factions and Prefabs (DMT)

New quests that target prefabs (POIs) containing NPCs of a certain faction.

Includes a Reputation mechanic, which is affected by killing NPCs, and quest rewards that affect the player’s reputation.

Requires the very latest version of [SphereII Core](https://7daystodiemods.com/dmt-mods-by-sphereii/)! There are added features in the new version, and this mod will not work without them.

### Changelog

* Fixed issues with quests and rally markers  
   * Whiteriver T5 “murder” quest now has correct objective  
   * Added rally marker to T5 Bandits POI  
   * Added rally marker to T5 Military POI

[README.md](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-a19-modlets/-/blob/master/khzmusik_Human_Factions_Prefabs_Quests/README.md) – **[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-a19-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-a19-modlets-master.zip?path=khzmusik_Human_Factions_Prefabs_Quests)**

## Human Prefabs, Quests, and Trader Lore Integration (DMT)

This mod ties the [trader lore](https://7daystodiemods.com/trader-lore/), human factions, prefabs, NPCPack humans, and faction quests mods, together into a cohesive experience.

Khzmusik highly recommend getting this mod, and all its dependent mods, if you want a fully-featured NPC experience.

[README.md](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-a19-modlets/-/blob/master/khzmusik_Trader_Lore_Human_Factions_Prefabs_Quests/README.md) – **[Download](https://gitlab.com/karlgiesing/7d2d-a19-modlets/-/archive/master/7d2d-a19-modlets-master.zip?path=khzmusik_Trader_Lore_Human_Factions_Prefabs_Quests)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/24348-a19-khzmusiks-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Khzmusik](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/khzmusik/)
